Message:
My comrades are hurt,
and the enemies close in...

I’m the only one left.
My unit...has fallen.

Then, I felt a warm light
radiating from behind me.

He, and all my new friends
were smiling at me.

We all fight for the same
ambitions...

Now’s the time!
I pulled the trigger.

Ma...I finally did it.
I protected everyone...
My fears have yet to disappear,

and I’m certain they will
continue to haunt me
relentlessly.

Thus...I swear to stand
alongside those fears
and continue to fight
to break these shackles.
